name: Top Seed
description:
Ever wondered what would happen if you combined the intricate physics of Super Monkey Ball with the wacky collection game Katamari Damacy? Top Seed has got you covered. In this game, you start with nothing and you must roll up fruit to get bigger and reach the end of the level! Fight for your best time, but be careful not to fall off!

Ludum Dare 45 entry

By: Bodie Malik and Taben Malik

Sounds provided by Zapsplat.com
